channel.title: Lazy Days (Sketch)
channel.description: This is a track that I made with Logic Pro, so I guess it's ok to post on this forum? :pray: It's also TOTALLY different than normal, so feedback is appreciated. (I've also been noticing some of SoundCloud's signature compression issues, so I hope it doesn't sound too bad... :grimacing: ) https://soundcloud.com/ballistikbeats/lazy-days-sketch

item.title: Lazy Days (Sketch)
item.dc:creator: DHO
item.description:
Maybe don’t use loops?

As somebody who has heard the loop in the intro, it sort of brings the thing down because it’s not unique to your song.

Read full topic
